about_the_game:
Warning: This is a gameplay demo

You will get a first impression of the vision of how A Twisted Tale is going to be.
Have fun exploring and thank you very much for playing!

Oh and: there are 23 hidden hommages and references to famous point & click adventures. Can you find them all?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 (64 Bit only)
  • Processor: 2,5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (10.7)
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core) Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
